LanguageData.PsychicAmplifier.label: tome of magical attunement
LanguageData.PsychicAmplifier.description: A consumable mystical tome that attunes a user to magic or upgrades their magical ability.\n\nUpon starting to read the user enters a trance, the symbols streaming off the pages and directly into their very being. Afterwards, the now empty tome disintegrates into worthless ash.
LanguageData.PsychicAmplifier.comps.0.useLabel: Use attunement tome to increase magical ability
